评论详情: Got this as a gift for my daughter. Her usual size is a medium but she likes to wear her clothes oversized so I got an XL since there were no previous reviews for me to determine how the sizing was. (Clothing from Asian markets tends to run small). I’m really glad I sized up because the XL is just *barely* oversized in the way that she likes.  I was nervous that the fabric would be cheap or stiff but that is not the case. It is super soft and appears to be of good quality. The zipper seems to be a good quality as well, and overall the hoodie seems durable. The stitching is good and seems like it will hold up well in the wash. My daughter absolutely loves the slightly distressed look of the stars and how soft the fabric feels. She really loved it and was excited to wear it right away.
